actions.noActionsToDisplay: No actions to display with the current filters.

config.collectLogs: Collect all logs for bug report
config.selectProviderOrPreset: Select a provider or preset from the sidebar to configure

connection.confirmDeletePreset: Are you sure you want to delete the preset "{{name}}"?

lettersModal.noLettersFound: No letters found. Letters will appear here when they are processed.

modals.areYouSureDeletePreset: Are you sure you want to delete the preset {{name}}?

promptPreview.noActiveConversation: No active conversation. Start a conversation to preview prompts.

prompts.label: Label
prompts.leaveEmptyDefault: Leave empty to use default text
prompts.promptBuilderHelp: Reorder, toggle, and edit blocks that compose the prompt.
prompts.resetMainPrompt: Reset main prompt to default template? This will replace current text.

settings.actionApprovalHelp: Configure when actions require user approval before execution. Destructive actions (like killing characters) always require approval regardless of these settings.
settings.approvalModeNonDestructive: Auto-accept Non-destructive (Only destructive actions require approval)
settings.letterStatusHelp: View the status of all letters in the generation and delivery pipeline.
settings.pauseOnApprovalHelp: When enabled, the conversation will pause when actions need approval, allowing you to review them before continuing.

summaries.aboutSummaryGenerationHelp: Summaries are automatically generated in two scenarios:
summaries.configureSummaries: Configure how conversation summaries are generated.
summaries.confirmClearSummaries: Are you sure you want to clear all conversation summaries? This action cannot be undone.
summaries.conversationSummaryManagementHelp: Manage conversation summaries stored for your characters.
summaries.finalSummariesHelp: Generated when a conversation ends. These comprehensive summaries are saved to character files and used as context in future conversations.
summaries.finalSummaryPromptHelp: This prompt is used at the end of a conversation to create a comprehensive summary that will be saved for future reference.
summaries.legacyDataImportHelp: Import conversation summaries from legacy VOTC installation. Existing summaries will be backed up.
summaries.letterSummaryPromptHelp: This prompt is used to generate summaries for letter exchanges between characters. These summaries are saved to character files and used as context in future conversations.
summaries.promptsActiveInfo: The prompts below show the current active prompts. Changes are automatically saved after you stop typing.
summaries.providerOverrideHelp: Choose a specific provider for generating conversation summaries. Leave as "Use Active Provider" to use your currently selected provider.
summaries.resetAllPrompts: Reset all summary prompts to defaults? This will replace all current text.
summaries.resetFinalPrompt: Reset final summary prompt to default? This will replace current text.
summaries.resetLetterSummaryPrompt: Reset letter summary prompt to default? This will replace current text.
summaries.resetRollingPrompt: Reset rolling summary prompt to default? This will replace current text.
summaries.rollingSummariesHelp: Created during long conversations when the context limit is approaching. These help compress older messages while preserving important information.
summaries.rollingSummaryPromptHelp: This prompt is used when the conversation gets too long and needs to be compressed. It creates incremental summaries during the conversation.

summariesManager.confirmDeleteCharacterSummaries: Are you sure you want to delete all summaries for this character? This action cannot be undone.
summariesManager.confirmDeleteSummary: Are you sure you want to delete this summary?
summariesManager.noSearchResults: No summaries found matching your search.
summariesManager.noSummariesFound: No summaries found. Start a conversation to create summaries.
summariesManager.searchPlaceholder: Search by character name, player ID, or summary content...
summariesManager.summariesManagerHelp: View, edit, and manage conversation summaries for all characters. Summaries are organized by your player characters.
